cnd20:10.5: kahāpaṇikampi → kahāpaṇākampi (bj) | khārāpatacchikampi → khārāpaṭicchikampi (mr) | palālapīṭhakampi → paḷālapiṭṭhikampi (bj)
cnd20:14.2: vosaggo → vossaggo (bj, sya-all) | anaṭṭhitakiriyatā → anavaṭṭhitakiriyatā (bj) | abahulīkammaṁ → abahulikammaṁ (mr)
cnd20:25.3: taṇhādhipanne → taṇhāadhipanne (bj, sya-all); taṇhāya adhipanne (mr) | taṇhāya panne → taṇhāyāpanne (bj, sya-all)
